data.title: Hours + Location
data.meta_description: Vic & Anthony's Steakhouse is located in Downtown Houston near Minute Maid Park. Voted Best Steakhouse & Best Downtown Restaurant. Menu | Reservations
data.meta_site_name: Vic & Anthony's Steakhouse | World-Class Steakhouse of Landry's Inc.
data.text:
About

Live Music Nightly in the Lounge

Conveniently located downtown Houston, Vic & Anthony’s award-winning menu delivers impeccable cuisine and service for ﬁne steakhouse dining. Preparing only the highest quality, our menu features USDA Prime Midwest grain fed beef, savory appetizers, fresh seafood, decadent desserts and an exquisite wine list available lunch and dinner while enjoying the live musical notes fill the atmosphere along the night.

Dress Code

Proper Attire is Required.

Vic & Anthony's enforces a strict upscale dress code. We do not allow beachwear, gym attire including sweatpants, sweatshirts or hoodies. Athletic apparel, jerseys, shorts, hats, beanies, bandanas, ball caps, oversized or baggy clothing, tank tops, and sleeveless shirts are prohibited. No excessively revealing clothing will be allowed. Clothing emitting offensive odors is not permitted to be worn anywhere on the property.
